definitions: The action or process of losing or destroying something by using it carelessly or extravagantly.
The amount of something that is wasted.
The reduction in the size of a workforce as a result of voluntary resignation or retirement rather than enforced redundancy.
The number of people leaving a job or further educational establishment before they have completed their training or education.
The weakening or deterioration of a part of the body, typically as a result of illness or lack of use.
